title: Prove You Love Me
description: You only hurt the ones you love.Sandra Dane is mine at last—truly mine. She’s agreed to step out of the shadows with me into the light of day, and together, we’ll be New York’s ruling king and queen. Nothing will stand in our way, and nobody can stop me. Except those I love and trust the most. My family. That’s the problem with always being out in it makes it so easy for people to stab you in the back. I’ve ruled my world with an iron fist. Now it’s falling apart right in front of me. And it’s threatening to pull Sandra from my side. Never. No matter what, Sandra belongs with me. To me. And I never give up what—or who—is mine.
author: July Hall
